title: New LCS format starting Summer Split 2016
body:
Just figured there could be people here, that (like me) didn´t know of these changes!

Basically: 
- NA is trying best of 3
- EUW is trying best of 2

I like it, but anyone else thinking, that the broadcasts are gonna get longer than before?
I mean, I´m not complainng, but there´s alrdy so much time you have to wait for the games (The caster -> analysts -> Shooks -> analysts -> 5 min. break -> casters -> champ select -> finally the next game).

EDIT: Hab erst jetzt festgestellt, dass ich im Deutschen Forum bin -.- .
